<WG2112> And Immediately <WG1161> Then <WG5119> <WG3588> Paul <WG3972> Sent Away <WG1821> The <WG3588> Brethren <WG80> To Go <WG4198> As <WG5613> To <WG1909> The <WG3588> Sea; <WG2281> <WG5278> But Remained <WG1161> <WG3588> Both <WG5037> Silas <WG4609> And <WG2532> <WG3588> Timothy <WG5095> There. <WG1563>

But <WG1722> In <WG1161> <WG3588> Athens <WG116> Waiting For <WG1551> Them <WG846> <WG3588> Paul, <WG3972> Was Painfully Excited <WG3947> <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> His <WG846> In <WG1722> Him <WG846> Seeing <WG2334> Full Of Idols <WG2712> Being <WG5607> The <WG3588> City. <WG4172>

<WG1949> And Having Taken Hold <WG5037> Of Him, <WG846> To <WG1909> The <WG3588> Mars ' <WG697> Hill <WG697> They Brought Him, <WG71> Saying, <WG3004> Are We Able <WG1410> To Know <WG1097> What Is <WG5101> <WG3588> New <WG2537> This <WG3778> Which <WG3588> By <WG5259> Thee <WG4675> Is Spoken <WG2980> Teaching? <WG1322>

Strange Things <WG3579> For <WG1063> Certain <WG5100> Thou Bringest <WG1533> To <WG1519> <WG3588> Our <WG189> Ears. <WG2257> We Wish <WG1014> Therefore <WG3767> To Know <WG1097> What <WG5101> May <WG302> Mean <WG2309> <WG5023> These Things. <WG1511>

Athenians <WG117> Now <WG1161> All <WG3956> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Sojourning <WG1927> Strangers <WG3581> In <WG1519> Nothing <WG3762> Else <WG2087>, Spent Their Leisure <WG2119> Than <WG2228> To Tell <WG3004> Something <WG5100> And <WG2532> To Hear <WG191> Newer. <WG2537>

Very Reverent To Demons) <WG1174> You <WG5209> I Behold; <WG2334>

Passing Through <WG1330> For, <WG1063> And <WG2532> Beholding <WG333> <WG3588> Objects Of Veneration <WG4574> Your, <WG5216> I Found <WG2147> Also <WG2532> An Altar <WG1041> On <WG1722> Which <WG3739> Had Been Inscribed, <WG1924> To An Unknown <WG57> God. <WG2316> Whom <WG3739> Therefore <WG3767> Not Knowing <WG50> Ye Reverence, <WG2151> Him <WG5126> I 1473 P-1NS Announce 2605 V-PAI-1S To You. 5213 P-2DP

To Seek <WG2212> The <WG3588>, Lord; <WG2962> If <WG1487> Perhaps <WG686> <WG1065> They Might Feel After <WG5584> Him <WG846> And <WG2532> Might Find Him, <WG2147> Though Indeed <WG2544> Not <WG3756> Far <WG3112> From <WG575> One <WG1520> Each <WG1538> Of Us <WG2257> Being; <WG5225>

Offspring <WG1085> Therefore <WG3767> Being <WG5225> Of <WG3588> God, <WG2316> We <WG3756> Ought Not <WG3784> To Think <WG3543> Of Gold <WG5557> Or <WG2228> To Silver <WG696> Or <WG2228> To Stone, <WG3037> A Graven Thing <WG5480> Of Art <WG5078> And <WG2532> Imagination <WG1761> Of Man, <WG444> That Which Is <WG3588> Divine <WG2304> To Be <WG1511> Like. <WG3664>
